title: 110_hr3505
content: The Act may be cited as the "Securities Law Technical Corrections Act of 2007" and includes technical corrections. The Securities Act of 1933 and the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 are amended to make technical corrections, such as adjusting punctuation and wording in various sections. The Securities Act of 1933 and the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 are amended to make technical corrections in various sections, such as adjusting punctuation and wording. The Securities Act of 1933 and the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 are amended to make technical corrections in various sections, including redesignating subsections and clauses. The Securities Act of 1933 and the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 are amended to make technical corrections in various sections, including redesignating subsections and clauses in the Trust Indenture Act of 1939. The Investment Company Act of 1940 is amended by making changes to various sections, such as updating clause references and inserting additional language for clarity. The Investment Company Act of 1940 is amended by updating clause references and inserting additional language for clarity in various sections. The Investment Advisers Act of 1940 is also amended by removing references to "principal business office" or "principal place of." The Investment Company Act of 1940 is amended by updating clause references and inserting additional language for clarity in various sections. The Investment Advisers Act of 1940 is also amended by removing references to "principal business office" or "principal place of business" and inserting "principal office and place of business" in specific sections. SEC. 3. CONFORMING AMENDMENTS FOR THE REPEAL OF THE PUBLIC UTILITIES HOLDING COMPANY ACT OF 1935. The Securities Exchange Act of 1934 is amended to redefine the term 'emergency' in cases of major market disturbances. The Securities Exchange Act of 1934 is amended to redefine the term 'emergency' in cases of major market disturbances by ensuring efficient operation of the national system for clearance and settlement of transactions in securities. The Securities Act of 1933 and the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 are amended to update references and remove outdated language. The Investment Company Act of 1940 is amended to update references and remove outdated language related to the Securities Act of 1933 and the Securities Exchange Act of 1934. The Investment Company Act of 1940 is amended to update references and remove outdated language related to the Securities Act of 1933 and the Securities Exchange Act of 1934. Additionally, references to the Public Utility Holding Company Act of 1935 are repealed in various sections of the Act and the Investment Advisers Act of 1940. The Investment Company Act of 1940 was amended to update references and remove outdated language related to the Securities Act of 1933 and the Securities Exchange Act of 1934. Passed by the House of Representatives on December 6, 2007.
